name: Pharmasave - Kitchener - Highland Rd W (Riepert)
comment:
Compounding pharmacy
  • treatment and prescription of medications for common medical ailments, including rashes, pink eye, insect bites, acne, and urinary tract infections
  • prescription of COVID-19 antiviral treatment (Paxlovid)
  • medication placed in blister packs (sealed, push-through packaging used to separate doses)
  • prescription refills and transfers
  • pharmacist available for diabetes management consultations
  • free seasonal flu vaccines
  • basic home health care supplies

MedsCheck - Appointments to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist

Pharmacy Smoking Cessation Program - Help to quit smoking, available for Ontario Drug Benefit recipients
serviceProvisionCode: Dispensing fee plus medication costs * prescribed medications may be covered by OHIP

description_of_this:
Compounding pharmacy
  • treatment and prescription of medications for common medical ailments, including rashes, pink eye, insect bites, acne, and urinary tract infections
  • prescription of COVID-19 antiviral treatment (Paxlovid)
  • medication placed in blister packs (sealed, push-through packaging used to separate doses)
  • prescription refills and transfers
  • pharmacist available for diabetes management consultations
  • free seasonal flu vaccines
  • basic home health care supplies

MedsCheck - Appointments to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist

Pharmacy Smoking Cessation Program - Help to quit smoking, available for Ontario Drug Benefit recipients, Codes: Dispensing fee plus medication costs * prescribed medications may be covered by OHIP, Features: Wheelchair Accessible, Languages: English, French, Spanish, Address: 98 Highland Rd W, Kitchener, ON, N2M 3B5, Location: lat: 43.4415, lon: -80.5019, Contact: phone: 519-578-1210, fax: 519-742-7343, url: pharmasave.com/kitchener-riepert/location/
